name: Devilated
storyline:
Meet Devilated, the bastard child of a Boomer Shooter and a Classic RPG after snorting a line of pure, uncut hyperviolence.

Shoot, ‘splode, slice, and shovel your way through a mysterious labyrinth brimming with bloodthirsty creatures. Style and savagery will be rewarded with a combo meter keeping score. Use the bodies of your foes as shields then consume them for health, slow things down with bullet time to land every shot, or equip several rocket launchers at once to show that subtlety is dead and you’re its unrepentant murderer.
summary: Devilated is a timeslowing, monster blasting, boomer shooter with RPG pretensions, buckets of blood and a dose of ultraviolence.
